results.title: Effects of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors beyond lowering blood pressure--are they important for doctors?
results.text_hl: The ACE-Is that were used to reduce @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@peripheral vessel resistance@@@ included @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_trandolapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C052035 @@@trandolapril@@@.

citations.NLM: Holecki M, Szewieczek J, Chudek J. Effects of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors beyond lowering blood pressure--are they important for doctors? Pharmacol Rep. 2011;63(3):740-51. PMID: 21857085
citations.BibTeX: @article{21857085, title={Effects of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors beyond lowering blood pressure--are they important for doctors?}, author={Holecki M and Szewieczek J and Chudek J}, journal={Pharmacol Rep}, volume={63}, number={3}, pages={740-51}}

results.title: Cardiac effects of ACE inhibition.
results.text_hl: Chronic treatment with @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ for 6-12 months induced @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@reduction in blood pressure@@@ associated with @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@decreased peripheral resistance@@@.

citations.NLM: Lund-Johansen P, Omvik P. Cardiac effects of ACE inhibition. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1993;22 Suppl 1():S36-40. PMID: 7507538
